name: Cosmos Quest V (demo)
description:
Cosmos Quest V is a browser based (except IE) point-and-click adventure game. The game created with HTML, CSS JS  + some js plugins. Best performance is on Chrome.

The demo contains intro and several playable rooms. You can play it online here:
https://www.cq-game.com/cq5/demo.html

Gameplay:
- No need to wait while the character is walking to the next room. Just double click on the exits (room edges) to skip the walking.
- The arrows on the bottom right part of the screen just shows where the exits are. They are not buttons.
